steps.title: Loading Tiles and Features
description: Now that you have some layers loaded on the map, let's walk through how to load some data!

steps.title: Date Control
description: Tiles and features are loaded for the time range chosen by the date control here. Pick a new date to
load tiles (and eventually features) for a different time span. If you don't see any tiles on the map,
check the layer's details in the Add Data window and make sure it has data within the chosen range.

steps.title: Loading Features
description: Once you have tiles loaded, you can query features with additional metadata by drawing a query region on
the map. Use the draw controls here to draw a query region, or use Shift+Click and drag to draw using the
most recently selected control. Draw the query area on the map, then choose Load from the menu.
